Words to Kick Your Teeth Out

Grounding
    1. A lamp hanging over head
    2. The overcast sky outside
    3. The felt cap across the desk
    4. A man in the seat aside across from me
    5. The clock 9:19 an hour behind
    1. Paper scrunching, crackling
    2. Fans, the AC? humming
    3. Keypresses tapping
    1. The textured chiclet keyboard
    2. On my wrist, smooth greenwood beads
    3. Soft dry socks warm my feet
    1. Coffee stale on my tongue
- Molossus Spondee
Posted
Nov 11, 2022
Category
poem
Tag
2021
Previous: Gears
